entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: White Rock 10:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

Humidity: 73 %

Wind: W 3 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High plus 5.
